title: Strategic Finance Associate
content:
Strategic Finance Associate
Current is a leading U.S. fintech with nearly 4 million members, serving people who have been overlooked by traditional banks. Headquartered in NYC, our results-driven environment enables us to build better products, grow faster and empower everyone on our team to have an impact on our business and our mission to improve financial outcomes for our members.  
About the role:
You will support Current’s rapid growth and most important decisions with analytical insight and strategic and tactical recommendations which drive the long term success of our business. You will identify and solve business opportunities using quantitative analysis and holistic problem-solving frameworks. You’ll communicate your findings to senior leadership and partner with others to operationalize the hypotheses and takeaways. This role requires a strong interest in problem solving, ability to recognize patterns, and cross-functional partnership (Risk, Marketing, Product, Growth, and Data) to drive decision-making. This is an exceptional opportunity to have a considerable impact on a rapidly scaling company in a disruptive industry. If you possess both technical and interpersonal skills and want to use this combination to influence the success of a high-growth fintech startup, we encourage you to apply!
Responsibilities:

Scenario-test potential new products; analyze pricing, risk strategies, marketing strategies, and changes to the business model  
Clearly communicate recommendations and analysis across teams 
Build and maintain bottom-up forecasting and analytical models
Help marketing, risk, product, and partnerships teams answer difficult questions around how our resource-allocation and team initiative prioritization impact our business
Conduct analyses and develop strategies which drive a demonstrable impact on Current’s KPIs  
Collaborate with data and product to translate a/b tests into forecasted profit and unit-economic impact 
Identify new & iterative high-impact opportunities to further scale or improve unit economic efficiency 

About You:

Intellectually curious - you seek to understand the why behind the numbers 
Highly technical - you value precision and accuracy when it comes to your work, and you can rapidly dissect complex quantitative problems
Critical thinker - you consider problems from all angles to remove bias 
Results-oriented - you will do whatever it takes to ensure success.  You ground your contributions in real customer and business impact and prioritize your time to maximize speed-to-impact.
Exceptional written and oral communication skills.  You drive consensus through grounded arguments, interpersonal skills, and negotiation skills.  
Creative problem-solver - able to identify obstacles and present viable solutions
Self-starter with a desire to learn and the ability to rapidly understand the business and its drivers
Comfortable working in a fast-moving, ambiguous environment
Excited by large breadth of problem areas 

Requirements:

3+ years in an analytical and client facing role across finance (banking, private equity, strategic finance), consulting, or other similar function 
Strong analytical, problem-solving, communication and collaboration skills
Excel expert - experience with B.I. tools is a plus (Looker / Data Studio) 
Strong data analytical ability - experience with SQL is a plus
Able to handle competing priorities and influence leadership decision-making

This role has a base salary range of $110,000- $150,000. Compensation is determined based on experience, skill level, and qualifications, which are assessed during the interview process. Current offers a competitive total rewards package which includes base salary, equity, and comprehensive benefits.
Benefits:

Competitive salary 
Meaningful equity in the form of stock options 
401(k) plan
Discretionary performance bonus program 
Biannual performance reviews
Medical, Dental and Vision premiums covered at 100% for you and your dependents 
Flexible time off and paid holidays 
Generous parental leave policy
Commuter benefits 
Fitness benefits
Healthcare and Dependent care FSA benefit 
Employee Assistance Programs focused on mental health 
Healthcare advocacy program for all employees 
Access to mental health apps 
Team building activities
Our modern Chelsea-based office with open floor plan, stocked kitchen, and catered lunches
